com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin

Class ScriptPostprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin.AbstractPostprocessor
      • com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin.ScriptPostprocessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Postprocess

    public class ScriptPostprocessor
extends AbstractPostprocessor
    A java API enabling execution of pre-existing scripts, in pre-defined locations on the YADA server, as Postprocess plugins. For more information see the Plugin Guide
    Author:
    David Varon

    • Method Detail

      • engage

        public String engage(YADARequest yadaReq,
            String result)
              throws YADAPluginException
        Enables the execution of a script stored in the YADA_BIN directory. To execute a script postprocessor plugin, pass preArgs, or just args the first argument being the name of the script executable, and the rest of the arguments those, in order, to pass to it. If YADARequest.getPostArgs() is not null and YADARequest.getPlugin() is null, then the plugin will be set to YADARequest.SCRIPT_POSTPROCESSOR automatically.
        Specified by:
        engage in interface Postprocess
        Overrides:
        engage in class AbstractPostprocessor
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        result - the content to transform
        Returns:
        a String containing the transformed content
        Throws:
        YADAPluginException - when there is a processing error
        See Also:
        Bypass.engage(com.novartis.opensource.yada.YADARequest)
